articles.author: Kadia Goba
articles.title: George Santos, freed by Trump, says he wants to reform American prisons - The Washington Post
articles.description: “There is nothing more that I want to do than to focus and dedicate my entire life to prison reform,” Santos said.
articles.content: Former lawmaker George Santos (R-New York), who served 84 days in federal prison before receiving a presidential commutation on Friday, says he knows what he wants to do with his life now that he is … [+22 chars]
